Detailed Description

The default item renderer respects all item renderer properties (see class ItemRendererProperties) and automatically scrolls the text of the selected item, if it does not fit into the boundaries.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Parameters:
properties Pointer to the item renderer properties, which define the look of the items.

void DefaultItemRenderer::DrawText (  DeviceContext *  dc,
const Item &  item,
const Rect &  text_rect,
INT  item_style
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the text of the item inside the given text rectangle. This method is invoked by DefaultItemRenderer::DrawItem and may be overwritten if the rendering of the text should be adjusted to custom requirements.

Parameters:
dc Device context where the drawing is done.
item Item which should be drawn.
text_rect Bounding rectangle of the text. The rectangle is already adjusted to respect the icon, the border gap and an optional indicator.
item_style Style of the item (see AbstractItemRenderer::ItemStyle).
